content: this is a great unisex hat that is worked from the top down it is a featured pattern this year 2021 for the crochet cancer challenge 1 **size** fits head circumference child 20 adult regular 21-22 adult large 23 **skill level** easy **yarn** 125 yards of worsted weight yarn orange sample uses 1 strand dk weight held with 2 strands of mohair or suitable substitute - when substituting you may want to try a worsted weight yarn that is on the thicker side when checking gauge **hook size** us size i/9 5 5 mm crochet hook **other ** read through all of the pattern notes before beginning and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer 1 https //sweetpotato3 com/2021-crochet-cancer-challenge-charity-crochet-event/
